entry.title: sublime配置sublime
entry.content: python环境配置集成器：sublimestep-1:ctrl+shift:package install problem:报错 There Are No Packages Available For Installation console: IPV6的问题，导致无法访问sublime的官网,于是在host中添加如下对应ip(IP地址用在线ping，host位置：C:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc)50.116.34.243 sublime.wbond.net 连接不上https://packagecontrol.io/channel_v3.jsonPreferences > Package Settings > Package Control > Settings - User 输入{“channels”: [ “https://packagecontrol.io/channel_v3.json", “https://web.archive.org/web/20150905194312/https://packagecontrol.io/channel_v3.json" ] 从网上下载package control插件，替换原来插件step-2： first:pip install flake8 second:ctrl+shift+p ，并输入 install Package，然后回车,安装subli,elinter third:Install SublimeLinter-flake8 fourth:配置SublimeLinter-flake8 具体见：https://www.cnblogs.com/zhaof/p/8126306.html?tdsourcetag=s_pctim_aiomsg
